1.1 .button

Various buttons & sizes

1.1 .button

Various buttons & sizes

.button--s Small button

.button--l Large button

Markup

<button class="button {{modifier}}">{{text}}</button>

1.1.1 .button--[color]

Button color modifiers

.button--red Red button

.button--blue Blue button

Markup

<button class="button {{modifier}}">{{text}}</button>
